<title level="1" pfs="">[Saurian Warmonger](/Monsters.aspx?ID=977)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These saurians adopt warfare as their primary role and greatest calling. They particularly excel at taking slaves.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 37

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Saurian_SaurianWarmonger.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 16">[Saurian Warmonger](/Monsters.aspx?ID=977)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Dinosaur" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=45" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +31; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +32, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +28, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +28, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +30, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +30

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +5

**Con** +6

**Int** +4

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) mancatcher_, _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 39 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +25 

**Will** +28 

</row>

**HP** 340

**Resistances**
fire 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_spear_ +32 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d6+16 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_mancatcher_ +31 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+16 slashing plus restrain

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +30 ([deadly d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d10+16 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +30 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 3d6+16 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_spear_ +32 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 3d6+16 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 37
- **3rd**
[Animal Vision](/Spells.aspx?ID=12) (at will; dinosaurs only)
- **4th**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)
- **Constant (2nd)**
[Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=293)

**Boneshaking Roar** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) The saurian warmonger bellows, evoking the power of the primordial world. Non-[dinosaur](/Traits.aspx?ID=45) creatures within 30 feet take 10d6 sonic damage (DC 34 basic Fortitude save). On a failed save, a creature is also [slowed 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 round (stunned 1d4 on a critical failure). The saurian can't use Boneshaking Roar again for 1d4 rounds.

**Primordial Balance**   A warmonger wields their mancatcher in one hand.

**Restrain**   When the warmonger makes a successful mancatcher Strike, their target must succeed at a DC 34 Reflex save or become [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) until the end of the warmonger's next turn. Each time the creature fails an attempt to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) the warmonger, it takes 2d6 piercing damage.

**Three-Limbed Lunge** <actions string="Single Action" />  The saurian warmonger makes three Strikes: one Strike each with the weapons in their hands and one Strike with their tail. They can perform these attacks in any order, though each counts toward their multiple attack penalty as normal. After making a Three-Limbed Lunge, the warmonger is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the beginning of their next turn.

</column>
